body.p: Dear Sir, Accompanying this I send the Governor a petition to remit a fine inflicted in the Bourbon Circuit Court against Robert H Thompson of Our City -- The Governor through his Clemency, respited this fine in October -- 60. Thompson is a poor man, and it would be a great hardship for him to pay a fine of $7500 -- He has already paid $3000 costs -- The respite has run out, and I trust you will send us a remission immediately -- Direct it to
